snippet.title: 1428: SHADOWS OVER SILESIA - Official trailer
snippet.description:
Shadows over Silesia is a dark action adventure game with fantasy elements, set in real medieval Europe. With true historical events in the background, you can mainly expect challenging puzzles and difficult battles, but also stealth passages and important decisions. You will come across possessed devil worshipers, sexual demons, and beasts from hell, as well as creatures well-known from European mythology.

We are starting a crowdfunding campaign to raise the amount of money needed to complete the development. You get a unique opportunity to not only pre-order the game and support the author, but also to get exclusive early access to the demo, alpha and beta versions of the game. The campaign can be found here: https://www.hithit.com/shadows1428.

Other useful links:
Hithit: https://www.hithit.com/shadows1428
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1228500
Web: https://shadows1428.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/avabBNY
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KUBIGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1428_shadows_over_silesia/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shadows1428
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/kubigames2013
